attributes.action: implement cancellations of all illegitamate debts in Third World Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is illegitimate debt?

Debt that a country cant afford to repay without meeting its peoples basic needs.
Debts on loans that the lender gave to oppressive regimes knowing that they were unlikely to benefit the people.
Debts on loans that the lender knew were going to be stolen through corruption.
Debts in payment for projects that failed because of bad advice on the part of the lenders.
Debt on unfair terms, such as exorbitantly high interest rates and penalty terms.
	

What is Needed?

It is important that safeguards are implemented to ensure that a similar debt crisis can’t reoccur in the future.

Full cancellation of unjust debts. Poverty stricken countries are in daily crisis and will continue to decline without the aid of debt relief.

An end to harmful conditions, which are imposed by institutions on the terms of repayment.

Future lending must be done in a transparent and open manner.
